title: How to question a phone's originality - Quora

response.answer_text: im thinking it goes like this… you disconnect it from charging….never, ever do this while its charging. look it straight in the display and say “you a fake-ass bitch". thats how i do it.
This question doesn’t make a lot of sense. Are you questioning whether or not this phone is counterfeit? Or are you questioning a communication on the phone?
